text: The central area of Belfast has been divided into seven Quarters related to its history: *Cathedral Quarter *Gaeltacht Quarter *Smithfield Market and Library Quarter *Linen Quarter *Market Quarter *Queen's Quarter *Titanic Quarter The Quarters do not evenly divide the city into four parts, and not all of Belfast's city centre is part of a Quarter. Instead, each Quarter has something important in its history and locale. The "Quarter" names were given in 2001. ==Other websites== * Discover the Quarters, Official Belfast Tourism Site
title: Belfast Quarters
